short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Escape the AI Overload and Reclaim Your Web Experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling overwhelmed by the constant flood of AI-related content on every website you visit?

Introducing BreakFromAI.com, a smart browser extension that lets you filter AI news and articles, giving you a more focused and personalized web experience.

- Take control of your browsing today with BreakFromAI.com

- Whether you're a professional needing to stay concentrated, a student wanting to filter content for better learning, or someone seeking a quieter online experience, BreakFromAI.com is your solution. Simple to use, highly customizable, and privacy-focused.

- Advanced Content Filtering
Enhanced algorithms for pinpoint accuracy in content detection.

- Focus on What Matters
Block AI content while still having access to other important news and updates.

- Improve Mental Well-being
Reduce information overload and enjoy a more serene browsing experience.
